languages.text: "Из того, что мы успели увидеть, {name}, могу предполагать, что мы имеем дело с варп-психозом той или иной разновидности". {n}Абеляр поразительно спокоен для человека, только что пережившего внезапное нападение.{/n} "Для пустотников, оказавшихся за пределами реального мира, подобные эксцессы не редкость... хотя обычно они остаются в пределах палуб".

traits.locale_text: "Из того, что мы успели увидеть, {name}, могу предполагать, что мы имеем дело с варп-психозом той или иной разновидности". {n}Абеляр поразительно спокоен для человека, только что пережившего внезапное нападение.{/n} "Для пустотников, оказавшихся за пределами реального мира, подобные эксцессы не редкость... хотя обычно они остаются в пределах палуб".

languages.text: "From what we have seen, {name}, I can speculate that we are dealing with some variety of madness induced by warp travel." {n}The Seneschal is astonishingly calm for someone who just survived a sudden attack.{/n} "Such episodes are not uncommon among voidsmen who have found themselves outside the boundaries of realspace... though such episodes seldom spill onto other decks."
languages.original_text: "Из того, что мы успели увидеть, {name}, могу предполагать, что мы имеем дело с варп-психозом той или иной разновидности". {n}Абеляр поразительно спокоен для человека, только что пережившего внезапное нападение.{/n} "Для пустотников, оказавшихся за пределами реального мира, подобные эксцессы не редкость... хотя обычно они остаются в пределах палуб".

traits.locale_text: "From what we have seen, {name}, I can speculate that we are dealing with some variety of warp madness." {n}The Seneschal is astonishingly calm for someone who just ran into an ambush.{/n} "Such episodes are not uncommon among voidsmen who have found themselves outside the boundaries of realspace... though said episodes seldom spill onto other decks."

"From what we have seen, {name}, I can speculate that we are dealing with some variety of warp madness." {n}The Seneschal is astonishingly calm for someone who just ran into an ambush.{/n} "Such episodes are not uncommon among voidsmen who have found themselves outside the boundaries of realspace... though said episodes seldom spill onto other decks."

"From what we have seen, {name}, I can speculate that we are dealing with some variety of warp madness." {n}The Seneschal is astonishingly calm for someone who just survived a sudden attack.{/n} "Such episodes are not uncommon among voidsmen who have found themselves outside the boundaries of realspace... though such episodes seldom spill onto other decks."

"From what we have seen, {name}, I can speculate that we are dealing with some variety of warp madness." {n}The Seneschal is astonishingly calm for someone who just survived a sudden attack.{/n} "Such episodes are not uncommon among voidsmen who have found themselves outside the boundaries of realspace... though such episodes seldom spill onto other decks."

"From what we have seen, {name}, I can speculate that we are dealing with some variety of madness induced by warp travel." {n}The Seneschal is astonishingly calm for someone who just survived a sudden attack.{/n} "Such episodes are not uncommon among voidsmen who have found themselves outside the boundaries of realspace... though such episodes seldom spill onto other decks."

languages.text: “在我看来，{name}，我认为当下的问题，是由于亚空间航行的影响导致的。”{n}总领才刚刚从突然袭击中幸存下来，他此刻的态度冷静得令人吃惊。{/n}“对那些游离在真实世界边缘的船员而言，这样的情况时而发生……不过，像这样的事故，很少会蔓延到其他甲板上。”
languages.original_text: "From what we have seen, {name}, I can speculate that we are dealing with some variety of madness induced by warp travel." {n}The Seneschal is astonishingly calm for someone who just survived a sudden attack.{/n} "Such episodes are not uncommon among voidsmen who have found themselves outside the boundaries of realspace... though such episodes seldom spill onto other decks."

traits.locale_text: “在我看来，{name}，我认为当下的问题，是由于亚空间的影响导致的。”{n}总领才刚刚从突然袭击中幸存下来，他此刻的态度冷静得令人吃惊。{/n}“对那些游离在真实世界边缘的船员而言，这样的情况时而发生……不过，像这样的事故，很少会蔓延到其他甲板上。”

languages.text: «Por lo que hemos visto, {name}, puedo especular que se trata de algún tipo de locura inducida por el viaje por la disformidad». {n}El Senescal está sorprendentemente tranquilo para acabar de rechazar un ataque sorpresa.{/n} «Estos incidentes no son infrecuentes entre la gente del vacío que acaba fuera de los límites del espacio real... aunque no suelen extenderse a otras cubiertas».
languages.original_text: "From what we have seen, {name}, I can speculate that we are dealing with some variety of madness induced by warp travel." {n}The Seneschal is astonishingly calm for someone who just survived a sudden attack.{/n} "Such episodes are not uncommon among voidsmen who have found themselves outside the boundaries of realspace... though such episodes seldom spill onto other decks."

traits.locale_text: «Por lo que hemos visto, {name}, puedo especular que se trata de algún tipo de locura de la disformidad». {n}El Senescal está sorprendentemente tranquilo para acabar de rechazar un ataque sorpresa.{/n} «Estos incidentes no son infrecuentes entre la gente del vacío que acaba fuera de los límites del espacio real... aunque no suelen extenderse a otras cubiertas».

languages.text: 「{name}様、これまで見てきたことから察するに、我々は<歪み>移動によって発生した、ある種の狂気に直面しているのではないかと推測できます」{n}家令長は、突然の攻撃を命からがら生き延びた直後にしては驚くほど冷静だ。{/n}「このような出来事は、リアルスペースの境界の外にいるヴォイドマンの間では珍しいことではありません…ただし、そうしたことが他のデッキに波及することはめったにありません」
languages.original_text: "From what we have seen, {name}, I can speculate that we are dealing with some variety of madness induced by warp travel." {n}The Seneschal is astonishingly calm for someone who just survived a sudden attack.{/n} "Such episodes are not uncommon among voidsmen who have found themselves outside the boundaries of realspace... though such episodes seldom spill onto other decks."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、これまで見てきたことから察するに、我々はある種の<歪み>の狂気に直面しているのではないかと推測できます」 {n}家令長は、突然の攻撃を命からがら生き延びた直後にしては驚くほど冷静だ。{/n}「このようなエピソードは、リアルスペースの境界の外にいるヴォイドマンの間では珍しいことではありません…ただし、そうしたエピソードが他のデッキに波及することはめったにありません」
「{name}様、これまで見てきたことから察するに、我々は<歪み>移動によって発生した、ある種の狂気に直面しているのではないかと推測できます」{n}家令長は、突然の攻撃を命からがら生き延びた直後にしては驚くほど冷静だ。{/n}「このような出来事は、リアルスペースの境界の外にいるヴォイドマンの間では珍しいことではありません…ただし、そうしたことが他のデッキに波及することはめったにありません」

languages.text: « De ce que nous avons vu, {name}, j'ai l'impression que nous sommes confrontés à une sorte de démence induite par la traversée du Warp. » {n}Le sénéchal est étonnamment calme pour quelqu'un ayant survécu très récemment à une attaque-surprise.{/n} « Ce genre de crise touche parfois les cosmomarins qui se retrouvent hors des frontières de l'espace réel... mais elle se propage rarement d'un pont à l'autre. »
languages.original_text: "From what we have seen, {name}, I can speculate that we are dealing with some variety of madness induced by warp travel." {n}The Seneschal is astonishingly calm for someone who just survived a sudden attack.{/n} "Such episodes are not uncommon among voidsmen who have found themselves outside the boundaries of realspace... though such episodes seldom spill onto other decks."

traits.locale_text: « De ce que nous avons vu, {name}, j'ai l'impression que nous sommes confrontés à une sorte de démence liée au Warp. » {n}Le sénéchal est étonnamment calme pour quelqu'un ayant fraîchement survécu à une attaque-surprise.{/n} « Ce genre de crise touche parfois les cosmomarins qui se retrouvent hors des frontières de l'espace réel... mais elle est rarement contagieuse d'un pont à l'autre. »

languages.text: "Aus dem, was wir gesehen haben, {name}, würde ich spekulieren, dass wir es mit einer Art von Wahnsinn zu tun haben, der durch Warpreisen ausgelöst wird." {n}Der Truchsess ist erstaunlich ruhig für jemanden, der gerade einen Überraschungsangriff überlebt hat.{/n} "Derlei Episoden sind nichts Ungewöhnliches für Raumfahrer, die sich außerhalb der Grenzen des Realraums bewegen ... allerdings greifen solche Episoden selten auf andere Decks über."
languages.original_text: "From what we have seen, {name}, I can speculate that we are dealing with some variety of madness induced by warp travel." {n}The Seneschal is astonishingly calm for someone who just survived a sudden attack.{/n} "Such episodes are not uncommon among voidsmen who have found themselves outside the boundaries of realspace... though such episodes seldom spill onto other decks."

traits.locale_text: "Aus dem, was wir gesehen haben, {name}, würde ich spekulieren, dass wir es mit einer Art von Warp-Wahnsinn zu tun haben." {n}Der Truchsess ist erstaunlich ruhig für jemanden, der gerade einen Überraschungsangriff überlebt hat.{/n} "Derlei Episoden sind nichts Ungewöhnliches für Raumfahrer, die sich außerhalb der Grenzen des Realraums bewegen ... allerdings greifen solche Episoden selten auf andere Decks über."

languages.text: "Tanık olduklarımıza bakarsak {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, tahminim öteboyut yolculuğunun tetiklediği bir delilikle karşı karşıya olduğumuz yönünde." {n}Seneşal, ani bir saldırıdan yeni kurtulmuş biri için şaşırtıcı derecede sakin.{/n} "Bu tür vakalar, kendilerini gerçekuzayın sınırları ötesinde bulan uçsuz erleri arasında oldukça yaygındır... Gerçi diğer güvertelere sıçraması da bir o kadar nadirdir."
languages.original_text: "From what we have seen, {name}, I can speculate that we are dealing with some variety of madness induced by warp travel." {n}The Seneschal is astonishingly calm for someone who just survived a sudden attack.{/n} "Such episodes are not uncommon among voidsmen who have found themselves outside the boundaries of realspace... though such episodes seldom spill onto other decks."
